(Georgi) Gaydadjiev Professor in Innovative Computer Architecture Faculty of Science and Engineering Telephone: +31 50 36 35106 E-mail: g.gaydadjiev rug.nl Homepage ORCID Research Portal Field/Discipline Computer Science, Hardware & Architecture Engineering, Electrical & Electronic Computer Science, Information Systems Expertise I am a Computer Engineer with more than 35 years of experience in the Industry and Academia. I helped the development of a wide-range of computing systems from tiny implantable devices up to supercomputers. All the above systems were designed to solve real problems.
